Why Data Collection Matters in Behaviour Support

The Role of Data in Behaviour Support

Accurate data is essential for understanding behaviour patterns and developing effective strategies.

Types of Behaviour Data

  • ABC Data — Antecedent, Behaviour, Consequence.
  • Frequency — how often behaviour occurs.
  • Duration — how long behaviour lasts.
  • Intensity — severity or impact.
